General.Name: Sichuan Huati Lighting Tech
General.Description: Sichuan Huati Lighting Technology Co.,Ltd. develops and sells LED lighting products in China. The company's products include multifunctional smart light pole, smart cabin, edge computing gateway, smart city furniture lightings. The company also provides landscape road, modern street, and landscape courtyard lights; and software for street light and parking management systems. In addition, the company is involved in the design and development of intelligent street lamp management and smart home systems. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
